name: Souvlaki Hero!
description:
A lil' shmup made by yours truly, ReindeerFlo, for the SVGS Summer Game Jam 2022 

A powerful hunger spurs a hero forth on a mission to impress a dangerous, world-ending entity.

In Souvlaki Hero, you’ll play the role of one hungry gorilla looking for revenge. Blast through 5 exciting shoot-em-up levels as you chase after the last Souvlaki ever made.

Use the Arrow Keys to move and the Z/X buttons to shoot!

(Any glitching text is intentional!).
